text:
Tried this place for the first time and it was a good choice cos the place is clean, staffs are attentive and the food are great and piping hot

The price are very reasonable and nice songs are played throughout. The 辣子鸡 is Damn nice and I will be back to try other dishes too

The $18 辣子鸡is fantastic as per many comments. Only meat, no bones. The portion is not that big. We tried the $33 嘛辣烤鱼. The fish is not seabass but more than river fish, lots of meat, few bones. Added $3.50 of cabbage, but portion is again small. But the mala sauce is super salty. I mean really really salty. I had to drink many glasses of water when we reached home. The atmosphere is excellent, not noisy, easy to talk. Background Chinese pop music is audible.

Skewers from just $1.20 and packed with bold, authentic Chinese BBQ flavours! Loved the Chuan Chuan, garlic baby lobster, and groundpot chicken. Cosy vibes, fast service, and so much variety — definitely a hidden gem worth revisiting!

Nice and clean place, pretty quiet when we arrived. Service was prompt and efficient.

Food wise was good, though some of the dishes were a little on the saltier side. Skewers were okay, though the underlying taste of the meats were not as apparent and overwhelmed by the seasoning a little.

Thirteen BBQ Bar is a hidden gem for barbecue lovers! The atmosphere is warm and inviting, perfect for a casual meal with friends or family. The menu boasts an impressive selection of smoked meats, all expertly prepared. The skewers are perfectly glazed and packed with flavor.

Overall, Thirteen BBQ Bar delivers on taste and quality, making it a must-visit for anyone craving delicious barbecue.
